FUNC.NAME: macroMicroPdfReportAppendInfo
FUNC.SYNOPSIS: is used to set the macroMicroPdfReportAppendInfo property.

PARAM.NAME: macroMicroPdfReportAppendInfo
PARAM.DESC: If true, the appended info is concatenated to the decoded data before being returned.

EXAMPLE.DESC: The following example enables the scanner and sets macroMicroPdfReportAppendInfo property

ADDITIONAL.PLATFORM: All supported devices except: Android devices.
ADDITIONAL.APPLIES: Transient - Decoder settings are only guaranteed to persist until the Scanner is disabled
ADDITIONAL.REQ: Scanner or Imager module and device that supports MacroMicroPDF.
